metadata.title: CVE-2024-32459 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients and servers that use a version of FreeRDP prior to 3.5.0 or2.11.6 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds read. Versions 3.5.0 and 2.11.6patch the issue. No known workarounds are available.

criterions.comment: freerdp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
